titles.title: Marine Protected Area Enhancement Act of 2000

To provide the waters and submerged lands off the coast of New Jersey and within the Historic Area Remediation Site shall be treated as a marine protected area for purposes of Executive Order 13158, dated May 26, 2000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 9/6/2000--Introduced. Marine Protected Area Enhancement Act of 2000 - Treats the waters and submerged lands within the Historic Area Remediation Site (a dredged material disposal area) off the coast of New Jersey as a marine protected area for purposes of Executive Order 13158, dated May 26, 2000.
